result.html: níl ionat ach buachaill beagYou're only a small boy.
result.ponchtml: níl ionat aċ buaċaill beagYou're only a small boy.

result.html: nach tú an buachaill dánaAren't you a naughty boy!
result.ponchtml: naċ tú an buaċaill dánaAren't you a naughty boy!

result.eng: He is the cleverest boy in the class.
result.ga: tá sé ar an bhuachaill is cliste sa rang
result.orig: tá sé ar an bhuachaill is cliste sa rang
result.html: tá sé ar an bhuachaill is cliste sa rangHe is the cleverest boy in the class.
result.ponchtml: tá sé ar an ḃuaċaill is cliste sa rangHe is the cleverest boy in the class.

result.eng: It was no surprise that an academic life was in store for the young boy when his mother was a medical doctor.
result.ga: níorbh aon ionadh gurbh é an saol acadúil a bhí i ndán don bhuachaill óg agus a mháthair ina dochtúir leighis
result.orig: níorbh aon ionadh gurbh é an saol acadúil a bhí i ndán don bhuachaill óg agus a mháthair ina dochtúir leighis
result.html: níorbh aon ionadh gurbh é an saol acadúil a bhí i ndán don bhuachaill óg agus a mháthair ina dochtúir leighisIt was no surprise that an academic life was in store for the young boy when his mother was a medical doctor.
result.ponchtml: níorḃ aon ionaḋ gurḃ é an saol acadúil a ḃí i ndán don ḃuaċaill óg agus a ṁáṫair ina doċtúir leiġisIt was no surprise that an academic life was in store for the young boy when his mother was a medical doctor.

result.html: cé leis an gasúrWhose boy is that?
